  • Method Details

    • withDeadlockReport

      ThreadDumper.ThreadDumperBuilder withDeadlockReport(boolean value)
      Print a separate section about deadlocked threads. Default is true

    • withFooterPrinter

      ThreadDumper.ThreadDumperBuilder withFooterPrinter(ThrowingConsumer<Appendable,Exception> value)
      Default is ThreadDumper.DEFAULT_FOOTER_PRINTER

    • withHeaderPrinter

      ThreadDumper.ThreadDumperBuilder withHeaderPrinter(ThrowingConsumer<Appendable,Exception> value)
      Default is ThreadDumper.DEFAULT_HEADER_PRINTER

    • withThreadFilter

      ThreadDumper.ThreadDumperBuilder withThreadFilter(Predicate<ThreadDumper.ThreadMeta> value)
      Only dump threads that match the given filter.

    • withThreadSorter

      ThreadDumper.ThreadDumperBuilder withThreadSorter(Comparator<ThreadDumper.ThreadMeta> value)
      Sort threads with the given comparator. Default is ThreadDumper.SORT_THREADS_BY_NAME
